result.eng: The team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ga: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.orig: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.html: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ponchtml: I nGaeilge aṁáin a ḃeiḋ an ḟoireann ag plé le gaċ gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.html: Tá mé i mbun gnóI am running a business.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mbun gnóI am running a business.

result.eng: The spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ga: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.orig: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.html: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó MheiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a ċoinneáil ar luċt gnó ṀeiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.

result.eng: That's where they would discuss current affairs.
result.ga: B'ann a chardáiltí gnoithe na hÉireann
result.orig: B'ann a chardáiltí gnoithe na hÉireann
result.html: B'ann a chardáiltí gnoithe na hÉireannThat's where they would discuss current affairs.
result.ponchtml: B'ann a ċardáiltí gnoiṫe na hÉireannThat's where they would discuss current affairs.

result.ga: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seo
result.orig: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seo
result.html: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seoHe means business this time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ar ẛon gnoiṫe an iarraiḋ seoHe means business this time.

result.ga: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.orig: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.html: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealachThat's why I came here.
result.ponchtml: Ba é sin mo ġnóiṫe an bealaċThat's why I came here.
